title: "Analysis Suggests EVs Cost 1.6 Times More to Service Than ICEs for the First Year"
excerpt: "However, an analytics firm has recently suggested that EVs are more expensive to maintain, even though the maintenance cost gets cheaper the longer you use them, Automotive News reports. The engineers must be quick to attribute the high service expenditures to the lack of owner service options on the new-generation cars."
